steps.title: Mission Briefing
steps.details:
Most humans bleed wealth through 'micro-transactions'. A $15 subscription is not $15. It is $180 of your life force per year. 

Today, we stop the bleeding. 

Prepare your banking app or credit card statement. You need visibility on the last 30 days of transactions.

steps.title: The Forensic Sprint
steps.details: You have 3 minutes. Scan your statement. Identify every recurring 'parasite' (Subscription). Do not judge yet, just capture.

stepB.title: The Kill List
stepB.details: Type the name and cost of every subscription you see.

steps.title: Triage The List
steps.details: Look at the list you just generated. Be honest. How many of these bring you genuine value versus how many are 'inertia taxes'?

steps.title: Execution Phase
steps.details: Do not negotiate. If it is not essential, it dies today. Use the links below or go to your app store settings.

steps.title: Calculate the Bounty
steps.details: Add up the monthly cost of everything you just cancelled or downgraded. Multiply by 12.

steps.title: Capital Recovered
steps.details:
You have successfully reallocated resources back to your future self. That money is now yours to command, not theirs to steal.

End Protocol.

steps.title: System Integrity Verified
steps.details:
Your audit reveals no parasites. You are running lean. Maintain vigilance.

End Protocol.
